definitions.definition: a device that uses either a system of wires along which electrical signals are sent or a system of radio signals to make it possible for you to speak to someone in another place who has a similar device:

examples: That son of mine is on the phone all day!

definitions.definition: to have a landline in the home:
examples: Are the Middletons on the phone at their cottage, do you know?

definitions.definition: to communicate with someone by phone:
